Animal Density from Camera Data

Data exploration, methods description, and functions from {abmi.camera.extras}

This website and associated R package provide information related to how the Alberta Biodiversity Monitoring Institute (ABMI) estimates the density of animals using data collected from remote cameras.

Site Contents

ABMI Camera Data

  • Image summaries
  • Species detections

  • Density at individual deployments

  • Density in an area of interest (AOI)

Functions

  • All functions

Package Installation

# Install the latest version from Github:
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mabecker89/abmi.camera.extras")

Issues

To report bugs, request additional features, or get help using the package, please file an issue. You can also email Marcus Becker mabecker@ualberta.ca.
